# zentral_mdm_dep_virtual_server (Data Source)

The data source `zentral_mdm_dep_virtual_server` allows details of a MDM DEP virtual server to be retrieved by its `ID` or `name`.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) ID of the MDM DEP virtual server.
- `name` (String) Name of the MDM DEP virtual server.
